Name: Distinct brain systems mediate the effects of nociceptive input and self-regulation on pain
Acknowledgements: Thanks to Asa Pingree and Namema Amendi for help with data collection.
Funding: This work was funded by R01 DA027794 and R01 MH076136 (TDW), by a Fulbright Graduate Study Fellowship to CW, and by a post-doctoral scholarship from the Canadian Institutes of Health Research grant (CIHR) to MR. Matlab code implementing all analyses is available at http://wagerlab.colorado.edu/tools.
HowToAcknowledge: In addition to any citation requirements in the dataset summary please use the following to cite this dataset: 'This data was obtained from the OpenfMRI database. Its accession number is ds000140.'
